title: Steve Harvey's Wife Marjorie Chauffeured In Luxury Car, Same Day Lori Harvey Arrested For Hit & Run
text:
Steve Harvey’s wife was being driven around town in a luxury car, the same day her daughter Lori Harvey was arrested for an alleged hit & run.

Marjorie Harvey shared a snap with her granddaughter Elle on social media yesterday. In the photo, you see Marjorie and Elle walking towards a Bentley with the doors held open for them.

The driver of the car holds an umbrella as they enter the vehicle. She captioned the post, “Not letting a little rain stop our dinner date ☔️😍 Nana + Elle #bestdateever”

The photo was taken hours before Steve's daughter was arrested in Beverly Hills.

Related:

Steve Harvey's Daughter Lori Harvey Arrested For Hit & Run in Los Angeles

View photos

22-year-old Lori was driving a Mercedes SUV in Beverly Hills on Sunday. She crashed the car into another car and flipped her vehicle. She then allegedly fled the scene.

According to reports, Police arrived at the scene and were able to track down Lori. The Beverly Hills Police Department arrested Lori on two counts: “misdemeanor hit and run, and delaying a police investigation.”

View photos

Police do not believe Lori was intoxicated or under the influence. She was not taken to jail but arrested and released on scene. She will have to appear in court on the charges.

Earlier in the day, Lori was hanging out in Malibu with a female friend. She shared snaps of her expensive bag in front of the beach. The two enjoyed a lunch date at Nobu. Later in the night she took in the beautiful sunset. She seemed unbothered following the car accident.

View photos
description: Only hours before her daughter's crash.
